text: Filippo Azzaiolo (1530 - 1569) was an Italian composer. He lived in 16th century. Azzaiolo worked in Bologna. All his known songs were composed between 1557 and 1569. Azzaiolo's most famous song is "Chi passa". ==References== Category:1530 births Category:1569 deaths Category:16th-century Italian composers Category:Renaissance composers
title: Filippo Azzaiolo
